name: Buddha's Mind Manager
description:
History knows Buddha as a man with unparalleled inner peace. How he exactly maintained his calm is not so well known. Go inside Buddha's mind and become his secret; Buddha's Mind Manager. 

Take the role of Mind Manager, empty Buddha's mind from thoughts and make sure history will only know a man with great inner peace.

-------------------------

developed by darkpencil1
